alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 3:54PM CDT until July 02 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Polk County in east Tennessee... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 454 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Wildwood Lake, or 8 miles southeast of Cleveland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benton, Ducktown, Wildwood Lake, William L. Davenport Refuge, Conasauga, Big Frog Mountain, Parksville, Copperhill, Archville and Gap Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
